pages.text:
Discovery Cove Group Events
Known for its breathtaking tropical atmosphere, Discovery Cove is the perfect place for a special event.  Whether you're planning a wedding, celebrating an anniversary, or treating your team to a relaxing outing, your event will be remembered for many years to come.
Need help planning something special?  Call
407-513-4600
to turn any special occasion into a one-of-a-kind, once-in-a-lifetime memory
Group Events
Plan your next event at Discovery Cove. Add unique atmosphere to anything from a casual company dinner to a corporate reception with Discovery Cove's extraordinary opportunities for groups.
Learn More
Cabanas, Special Occasions and Proposals
Add either a Cabana or Celebration package to make your day at Discovery Cove even more memorable.
Learn More
Weddings
Discovery Cove wedding and vow renewal packages take place before the park opens and are designed for those looking for a serene and intimate way to say “I DO”.
Learn More

Discovery Cove Contact Information
Questions?  Comments?  Contact us!
Please send us your comments, suggestions and questions.  Your message will be reviewed by the appropriate department and we will make every effort to respond within 5 business days, however, response times can be affected due to the high volume of emails we receive each day.
You can also find answers for commonly asked questions on our
frequently asked questions
page.

What is Discovery Cove?
Welcome to Discovery Cove, a unique all-inclusive day resort where you and your family will experience exciting animal encounters in a breathtaking tropical atmosphere.
Voted #1 Best Theme Park in Orlando by USA Today, Discovery Cove is an all-inclusive day resort where you will enjoy a one-of-a-kind opportunity to
swim with dolphins
, snorkel among thousands of tropical fish and rays in
The Grand Reef
, hand-feed hundreds of exotic birds in
Explorer’s Aviary
, encounter playful otters and curious marmosets as you explore the turquoise waters of
Freshwater Oasis
.  Looking to wind down? Relax in tropical lagoons at
Serenity Bay
surrounded by lush landscaping, then float through a beautiful cave as
Wind-Away River
takes you through rainforest-like environments, through our free-flight aviary and past stunning waterfalls. Experience the most exciting animal encounters the world has to offer in a breathtaking tropical atmosphere.
Your all-inclusive day includes a freshly prepared breakfast, gourmet lunch, plus endless snacks and beverages (including beer and wine for guests 21 and older). Additional all-inclusive amenities include lockers, animal-safe sunscreen, towels, wetsuits, snorkel gear and free parking.
Shower facilities stocked with soap, shampoo, and conditioner are also complimentary.
Reservations are required; daily attendance is limited to ensure every guest feels like a VIP. Guests are greeted at a luxurious reception center and proceed down a nature walk for their day of discovery.
Upgraded packages
are available that include admission to SeaWorld® Orlando and Aquatica, SeaWorld’s Waterpark® for 14 days surrounding the visit to Discovery Cove. Are you a
Florida resident
? Save year-round on admission!
Your day at Discovery Cove includes:
Swim with dolphins
With the purchase of a Dolphin Swim package, you’ll enjoy the highlight of your day, a one-on-one dolphin encounter.
Learn More
Unlimited food and beverage
Enjoy freshly prepared breakfast, lunch, snacks and beverages (including select beer and wine) throughout the day.
See Menu
Unlimited play on beaches and waterways
Snorkel with thousands of tropical fish, float through a relaxing lazy river, meet curious animal ambassadors or sunbathe on white sandy beaches.
See All Things to Do
Worry-free amenities
Enjoy complimentary parking, Wi-Fi, lockers, sunscreen, snorkel gear, showers, changing facilities and fresh towels for you and your family.
See All
